title: Does Zantac Cause False Positives for Methamphetamines?
subtitle: Rumors that ranitidine causes false positives for meth in drug screening have circulated for years, but the conditions under which this would happen are extremely rare.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Zantac (ranitidine) or similar acid reflux medications cause users to falsely test positive for meth use.
